title: Limgrave
text: A temperate land of green plains and golden trees, with windswept hills to the north and a dense, mist-shrouded woodland to the east.
label: Region

title: Caelid
text: A wasteland on the south-eastern tip of the Lands Between, plagued by Scarlet Rot and inhabited by all manner of malformed creatures.
label: Region

title: Weeping Peninsula
text: The peninsula derives its name from its unceasing rainfall, giving the impression of a land in constant lament
label: Region

title: Liurnia
text: Characterised by its vast forests, sheer cliffs, and ever-present fog, the majority of the region is sinking into a lake.
label: Region
